$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

苹果、微软、亚马逊和谷歌的总市值为7.1万亿美元，比世界上除美国和中国以外的所有国家的GDP都要大。

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

nodes.title: A week ago, the $VIX saw its 3rd largest single-day spike in history (+62%). All of that increase has been erased as of today's close with volatility moving sharply lower. https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 一周前，美元VIX指数出现了历史上第3大单日飙升（+62%）。截至今日收盘，所有的涨幅都被抹去，波动率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。
一週前，美元VIX指數出現了歷史上第3大單日飆升（+62%）。截至今日收盤，所有的漲幅都被抹去，波動率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。

nodes.excerpt: Plan the things you love to do with your friends both online and in person. Make plans with friends, share plans, see what others are up to, and keep track of upcoming events. Plan get-togethers, brunch, study sessions, your next date, you name it!

nodes.excerpt: Signing bad contracts is the worst. TermScout uses NLP + human attorneys to analyze more than 600 data points in common SaaS agreements and rates them based on customer favorability. Less negotiating, less legal, less confusion. Stop signing bad contracts!
nodes.title: TermScout - Free reviews and ratings on top SaaS contracts
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 签坏合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人类律师分析常见SaaS协议中的600多个数据点，并根据客户好感度进行评分。减少谈判、减少法律、减少困惑。别再签烂合同了!
localize.tagline: 对顶级SaaS合同的免费审查和评级

localize.description: 籤壞合同是最糟糕的。TermScout利用NLP+人類律師分析常見SaaS協議中的600多個數據點，並根據客戶好感度進行評分。減少談判、減少法律、減少困惑。別再籤爛合同了!
localize.tagline: 對頂級SaaS合同的免費審查和評級

Apple $AAPL:…
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

sharedContent.title:
The combined annual revenue of the 4 largest US companies has surpassed $1 trillion for the first time...
Apple $AAPL: $294 billion
Microsoft $MSFT: $153 billion
Amazon $AMZN: $386 billion
Google $GOOGL: $183 billion

That's larger than the GDP of all but 16 countries.

localize.tagline: 针对任何应用的自助式DevOps自动化

localize.description: Bunnyshell是一個自助式的DevOps自動化平臺，可以幫助團隊縮短停機時間，並高速交付可靠的應用程序和服務。
localize.tagline: 針對任何應用的自助式DevOps自動化

nodes.excerpt: final makes it easy to give & receive feedback on your video & audio files. It marks all comments with a timestamp, so you know exactly where to make changes. Your project feedback gets stored in one place & you never have to skim through lots of emails again.
nodes.title: final - Real time feedback for your video and audio files.
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: final 让您可以轻松地对您的视频和音频文件进行反馈和接收。它用时间戳标记所有的评论，这样你就可以准确地知道在哪里进行修改。你的项目反馈会被存储在一个地方，你再也不用浏览大量的电子邮件了。
localize.tagline: 对您的视频和音频文件进行实时反馈。

localize.description: final 讓您可以輕鬆地對您的視頻和音頻文件進行反饋和接收。它用時間戳標記所有的評論，這樣你就可以準確地知道在哪裏進行修改。你的項目反饋會被存儲在一個地方，你再也不用瀏覽大量的電子郵件了。
localize.tagline: 對您的視頻和音頻文件進行實時反饋。

nodes.title:
41% annualized revenue growth under Jeff Bezos since Amazon went public in 1997. One for the record books, will be hard for anyone to top.

$AMZN https://t.co/4WZzjYK2Yn
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text:
自1997年亚马逊上市以来，在杰夫-贝佐斯的带领下，年收入增长41%。这是一个创纪录的成绩，很难有人能超越。

$AMZN https://t.co/4WZzjYK2Yn

自1997年亞馬遜上市以來，在傑夫-貝佐斯的帶領下，年收入增長41%。這是一個創紀錄的成績，很難有人能超越。

$AMZN https://t.co/4WZzjYK2Yn
